casebody.data:
EUREKA COUNTY; Etcheverry Family Ltd. Partnership; and Diamond Cattle Company, LLC, Petitioners,
v.
Jason KING, P.E., Nevada State Engineer, Division of Water Resources, Department of Conservation and Natural Resources, Respondent,
and
Kobeh Valley Ranch, LLC ; and Diamond Natural Resources Protection & Conservation Association, Real Parties in Interest. No. 75814 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED AUGUST 30, 2018

DENIED.
